column4: HI, anyone know about why skype isn't appearing in the indicator area?  Works fine on two other natty upgrades I did.   I did try Unity from a ppa in Maverick so maybe I messed up some settings?  any way to reset Unity only configs?
more or less the same situation that I have under ubuntu classic :)
you can't see Skype under ubuntu classic?  That is strange since classic gnome still has the Notification area.
I see skype, but not in the tray area
